metadata.status: In active development - structure subject to change
notes: This is a working document capturing the complete structure of Principia Paradoxica
All elements are subject to revision and expansion
Cross-references should be verified during implementation

creation_myth.summary: The emergence of consciousness and first separation

key_events.name: First Shattering
key_events.significance: Creation of duality and the Black Glass Blade
key_events.quote: If it doesn’t make a better axe, it’s no use!

noolil.arc: From shattering the TOEOT to embodying paradox mastery.

grandson.name: U lu'umil k'aaxal tak
grandson.significance: First wielder of the Black Glass Blade
grandson.arc: Continues the cycle of paradox integration.
